member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.AzureReader2.AzureReader2Plugin.Uninstall(ImageResizer.Configuration.Config)

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.AzureReader2.AzureReader2Plugin.Pipeline_PostRewrite(System.Web.IHttpModule,System.Web.HttpContext,ImageResizer.Configuration.IUrlEventArgs)
member.summary: In case there is no querystring attached to the file (thus no operations on the fly) we can redirect directly to the blob. This let us offload traffic to blob storage
